Regulation Name(s): In vitro diagnostic device for Bacillus spp. detection
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for JBAIDS Anthrax Detection Kit using real-time PCR for qualitative detection of Bacillus anthracis DNA from whole blood, blood cultures, and bacterial cultures, with addition of IT 1-2-3 Platinum Path Sample Purification Kit accessory.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro detection of Bacillus anthracis DNA from whole blood, positive blood cultures, or cultured organisms using real-time PCR; Target 2 assay used only after a positive Target 1 assay; results to be interpreted in conjunction with clinical, culture, and other laboratory findings.
